attributes.action: Cease betway from trading in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
WhatsApp images are available for the bets hedged by betway under betfair 
Also SAR documents are available of exploitation of problem gambler. 
Contact is also available of self excluded customer they forced to reopen. 
Threats made to another customer if he closed account his partner would be notified.
attributes.background: Betway encourages problem gambling. Its evidently given 900k to a problem gambler without conducting adequate checks. It's also knows to contact self excluded customers to force them to reopen. Also its hedges bets within the UK and doesn't pay tax according to this profit made on hedging.
